nodes.text: Tula Markona was a human female who lived on the isolated moon of Hubin with her father, Thane Markona. She gave a tour of the clan's community to Luke Skywalker and Han Solo.

Tula Markona had black hair, gray eyes, and dark skin. She showed feelings toward Luke Skywalker, as shown when she was concerned when he was battling the thanrax. She enjoyed looking at his lightsaber, as it reminded her of her grandmother's.
Tula Markona first appeared in the 2018 canon comic Star Wars 57, written by Kieron Gillen and illustrated by Angel Unzueta.
